short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: chrome extension for to save any checkpoints (read, watch, listen, etc)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing a revolutionary Chrome extension designed to enhance your online browsing experience like never before. Our innovative extension is your go-to solution for seamlessly saving checkpoints across a wide range of content types, including tutorials to try, videos to watch, podcasts to listen to, and much more. Say goodbye to the frustration of losing your last tutorial checkpoint or forgetting where you left off in that captivating video series. With our Chrome extension, your online journey becomes smoother, more organized, and highly efficient.

Imagine a world where you can effortlessly bookmark your progress in online courses, tutorials, or research articles with a simple click. Whether you're a student looking to track your progress in an e-learning module or a professional trying to manage a multitude of resources, our Chrome extension has you covered
